short_summary: Provide taxi service in The Pas, Manitoba
full_summary:
## Solicitation for Taxi Services in The Pas, Manitoba

### Reference Information

* Reference Number: MX-22608858026
* Solicitation Number: 202211001
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: Thursday, November 3, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: Friday, November 25, 2022, at 6:00 PM (Eastern Time)

### Tender Status

This solicitation has expired.

### Description

VIA Rail Canada Inc. is issuing an Invitation to Tender for the provision of taxi services to aid VIA locomotive engineers between The Pas, Thompson (Manitoba), and Canora (Saskatchewan).

### Requirements

* Bidding and contract documents are available on the Merx website at [https://www.merx.com/](https://www.merx.com/).
* Fees may apply; see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more details.

### Contact Information

* For questions and clarifications, please contact:
	+ Name: Jean-Louis Derrey
	+ Email: Jean-Louis_Derrey@viarail.ca
	+ Phone: 514-871-6041

### Other Information

* This Invitation to Tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* Tax services are to be provided at The Pas, Manitoba, and include zones that may span into neighboring jurisdictions.

The tender description has been rewritten and reformatted to more professionally present the information required for a government tender.

LOC-TOC structure has been converted into a proper spacing.

A list section has been completely removed including GSN/all NIBS/and regions of opportunity.
